quotes.quote: Traveling is not something you're good at. It's something you do, like breathing.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
The Impulse to Travel is one of the hopeful symptoms of life.
Once a year, go someplace you've never been before.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The journey matters more than the destination.
Always there has been an adventure just around the corner… And the world is still full of corners.
One travels to run away from routine, that dreadful routine that kills all imagination and all our capacity for enthusiasm.
You will never discover new places if you stand still.
Travel is never a matter of money, but of courage.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You only get one chance at this life - make it count.
Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us, or we find it not.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Didn't know where I was going. Didn't care where I ended up. I knew I'd be okay though.
If you want to go somewhere you like but no one else wants to, go by yourself. You'll meet people with similar interests as you.
Life is short and the world is wide, the sooner you start exploring it, the better.
quotes.author: Simon Raven

quotes.quote: Be careful going in search of adventure – it's ridiculously easy to find.
Traveling allows you to become so many different versions of yourself.
The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Go someplace you've never been and see how it can spark your imagination.
All you need to know is that it's possible.
Where to next?
Traveling; it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
quotes.author: Ibn Battuta

quotes.quote: Life is meant for good friends and great adventures.
I travel because I become uncomfortable being too comfortable.
I travel because I'd rather look back at my life, saying 'I can't believe I did that' instead of 'if only I had'.
Your life is meant to be spent, not saved.
Travel doesn't become adventure until you leave yourself behind.
We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.
Sometimes life takes you places you never thought you would be.
There are no foreign lands. It is the traveler only who is foreign.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Live your life by a compass, not a clock.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey
